User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap
Sitemap: https://svasam.com/sitemap.xml

# Block unnecessary files
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /private/
Disallow: /*.json$
Disallow: /src/
Disallow: /node_modules/
Disallow: /.git/
Disallow: /dist/

# Allow important directories
Allow: /css/
Allow: /js/
Allow: /images/
Allow: /icons/
Allow: /assets/

# Crawl delay for respectful crawling
Crawl-delay: 1
